name: ojos
description: High level API on top of Mirada (opencv.js) supporting bth browser and node.

scripts.test: npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config.js
scripts.test-js: npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config-js.js
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run ops-metadata && npx tsc
scripts.docs: npm run docs-readme-toc && npm run docs-api-md && npm run docs-api-html
scripts.docs-api-md: rm -rf ./api && mkdir -p ./api && typedoc --ignoreCompilerErrors --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --out ./api --mode modules --readme none src/index.ts && rm -rf ../../demos/docs/ojos-api-md && mkdir -p ../../demos/docs/ojos-api-md && mv api/* ../../demos/docs/ojos-api-md
scripts.docs-api-html: rm -rf ./api && mkdir -p ./api && typedoc --ignoreCompilerErrors --plugin none --out ./api --readme none --mode modules src/index.ts && rm -rf ../../demos/docs/ojos-api-html && mkdir -p ../../demos/docs/ojos-api-html && mv api/* ../../demos/docs/ojos-api-html
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && npm run test-js && npm run docs
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m 'version patch' && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
